Cooperation
\begin{gather*} 
	  E^{*} = \frac{\delta \times (\gamma_{s,2} + \gamma_{s,1})}{\gamma_{s,1} \times \gamma_{e,2}} \\
    S^{*} = \frac{\delta_p}{\gamma_{s,1}}\\
    gen^{*} = \frac{(-\delta \times \gamma_{e,2} \times \gamma_{s,1}) + (1 + \kappa_e) \times \mu_e \times (\delta \times (\gamma_{s,2} - \gamma_{s,1}) + (\gamma_{e,2} \times \gamma_{s,1} \times R))}{\gamma_{e,2} \times \gamma_{s,1} \times \zeta_{e,2}} \\
    sp^{*} = \\
    \frac{(\gamma_{e,2} \times \gamma_{s,1} \times R \times ((1 + \kappa_s) \times \mu_s \times \zeta_{e,2} - (1 + \kappa_e) \times \mu_e \times \zeta_{s,2}) - \delta \times (\gamma_{e,2} \times (1 + \kappa_s) \times \mu_s \times \zeta_{e,2} + \gamma_{e,2} \times \gamma_{s,1} \times (\zeta_{e,2} - \zeta_{s,2}) + (\gamma_{s,2} - \gamma_{s,1}) \times (1 + \kappa_e) \times \mu_e \times \zeta_{s,2}))}{\gamma_{e,2} \times \gamma_{s,1} \times \zeta_{e,2}\times \zeta_{s,1}} \\
	\end{gather*}

Competition
\begin{gather*} 
     E^{*} = \frac{\delta \times (\gamma_{s,2} + \gamma_{s,1})}{\gamma_{s,1} \times \gamma_{e,2}} \\
    S^{*} = \frac{\delta_p}{\gamma_{s,1}}\\
    \frac{dsp}{dt} = (\gamma_{s,1} \times sp \times S) - (\delta_p * sp) \\
    gen^{*} = \frac{(-\delta \times (( - \gamma_{s,2} + \gamma_{s,1}) \times (\mu_e + \gamma_{e,2} \times (\gamma_{s,1} + \beta_{e,s} \times \mu_e)) + (\gamma_{e,2} \times \gamma_{s,1} \times \mu_e \times R))}{\gamma_{e,2} \times \gamma_{s,1} \times \zeta_{e,2}} \\
	\end{gather*}
